page.title: 14A WEEK IN THE LIFE OF A MUM
page.content: After rising at 7.00 I prepare a family breakfast.My daughter walks to school,I tackle household chores.Twice a week I drive to Cambridge.I'm employed part_time by an established bookseller.I assist in their busy computerised accounts department. Mid_afternoon Tanya arrives home with a schoolfriend and we discuss their day.I prepare evening dinner. Voluntarily I help at Primary School with reading.Interspersed with my weekly shopping I visit aunty and friends.Before the library,housework. Weekends are family visiting friends or relatives and local places.Early afternoon we watched Tanya in a ballet concert.Later we attended family fun day at her school.Sunday's a River Regata at Ely.
